xyz.fsgik.common.encode

Interface FsEncoder


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface FsEncoder
    Encoder interface for encoding and decoding (such as Base64 and Hex).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FsEncoder base64()
      Returns base64 encoder.
      static FsEncoder base64Mime()
      Returns base64 encoder (MIME format).
      static FsEncoder base64MimeNoPadding()
      Returns base64 encoder (MIME format without padding).
      static FsEncoder base64NoPadding()
      Returns base64 encoder (without padding).
      static FsEncoder base64Url()
      Returns base64 encoder (URL format).
      static FsEncoder base64UrlNoPadding()
      Returns base64 encoder (URL format without padding).
      default byte[] decode(byte[] source)
      Decodes source array.
      default int decode(byte[] source, byte[] dest)
      Decodes source array into dest array, return number of bytes written.
      default int decode(byte[] source, int sourceOffset, byte[] dest, int destOffset, int length)
      Decodes source array of specified length from source offset index, into dest array from dest offset index, return number of bytes written.
      byte[] decode(byte[] source, int offset, int length)
      Decodes source array of specified length from offset index.
      default java.nio.ByteBuffer decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
      Decodes source byte buffer.
      default int decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer source, java.nio.ByteBuffer dest)
      Decodes source byte buffer into dest byte buffer, return number of bytes written.
      long decode(java.io.InputStream source, java.io.OutputStream dest)
      Decodes source stream into dest stream, return number of bytes written.
      default java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String source)
      Resolves source string with StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1, and build encoding result to string with FsChars.defaultCharset().
      int decodeBlockSize()
      Returns block size for decoding.
      default java.lang.String decodeToString(byte[] source)
      Decodes source array and build encoding result to string with FsChars.defaultCharset().
      default byte[] encode(byte[] source)
      Encodes source array.
      default int encode(byte[] source, byte[] dest)
      Encodes source array into dest array, return number of bytes written.
      default int encode(byte[] source, int sourceOffset, byte[] dest, int destOffset, int length)
      Encodes source array of specified length from source offset index, into dest array from dest offset index, return number of bytes written.
      byte[] encode(byte[] source, int offset, int length)
      Encodes source array of specified length from offset index.
      default java.nio.ByteBuffer encode(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
      Encodes source byte buffer.
      default int encode(java.nio.ByteBuffer source, java.nio.ByteBuffer dest)
      Encodes source byte buffer into dest byte buffer, return number of bytes written.
      long encode(java.io.InputStream source, java.io.OutputStream dest)
      Encodes source stream into dest stream, return number of bytes written.
      int encodeBlockSize()
      Returns block size for encoding.
      default java.lang.String encodeToString(byte[] source)
      Encodes source array and build encoding result to string with StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1.
      default java.lang.String encodeToString(java.lang.String source)
      Resolves source string with FsChars.defaultCharset(), and build encoding result to string with StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1.
      static FsEncoder hex()
      Returns hex encoder.

      • encode

        default java.nio.ByteBuffer encode(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
        Encodes source byte buffer. The returned buffer's position will be set to 0 and limit is length of result bytes.
        Parameters:
        source - source byte buffer
        Returns:
        encoded buffer

        dest - dest byte buffer
        Returns:
        number of bytes written

      • encodeToString

        default java.lang.String encodeToString(byte[] source)
        Encodes source array and build encoding result to string with StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1.
        Parameters:
        source - source array
        Returns:
        encoded string

      • encodeToString

        default java.lang.String encodeToString(java.lang.String source)
        Resolves source string with FsChars.defaultCharset(), and build encoding result to string with StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1.
        Parameters:
        source - source string
        Returns:
        encoded string
